title: Jeanne Dielman, 23 quai du Commerce, 1080 Bruxelles
overview: A meticulous portrait of a widowed housewife’s daily routine, revealing the psychological toll of domestic labor in chilling detail.

title: Eyes Without a Face
overview: A brilliant surgeon, guilt-ridden over a car accident that disfigured his daughter, kidnaps young women in hopes of grafting their faces onto hers.

title: Diary of a Lost Girl
overview: After becoming pregnant out of wedlock, a young woman is sent to a repressive reform school, where she resists societal condemnation and eventually finds her way back to herself. A haunting silent-era critique of patriarchal hypocrisy, anchored by Louise Brooks’ iconic performance.

title: Wanda
overview: Drifting through Pennsylvania coal country, a disaffected woman finds herself entangled in a small-time crime spree. Barbara Loden’s landmark directorial debut is a raw and haunting portrait of female alienation and working-class despair.

title: Mulholland Dr.
overview: An aspiring actress and a woman with amnesia unravel a cryptic Hollywood conspiracy in this dreamlike neo-noir puzzle.

title: Persona
overview: An actress who has fallen mute is cared for by a nurse at a seaside cottage, where the boundary between their identities dissolves.

title: Chungking Express
overview: Two melancholy Hong Kong cops navigate love and loneliness in a neon-drenched cityscape, connected by a fast-food stand.

title: Au hasard Balthazar
overview: A saintly donkey bears silent witness to the cruelty, indifference, and fleeting kindness of the human world as he passes from one owner to another.

title: Blue Velvet
overview: A college student uncovers a sinister underworld hidden beneath the idyllic surface of his hometown after discovering a severed ear.

title: Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind
overview: When their relationship turns sour, a couple undergoes a medical procedure to have each other erased from their memories.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
overview: A meek Hobbit from the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the powerful One Ring and save Middle-earth from the Dark Lord Sauron.

title: The Grand Budapest Hotel
overview: A writer encounters the owner of an aging high-class hotel, who tells him of his early years serving as a lobby boy in the hotel's glorious years under an exceptional concierge.

title: Get Out
overview: A young African-American visits his white girlfriend's parents for the weekend, where his simmering uneasiness about their reception of him eventually reaches a boiling point.

title: Inglourious Basterds
overview: In Nazi-occupied France during World War II, a plan to assassinate Nazi leaders by a group of Jewish U.S. soldiers coincides with a theatre owner's vengeful plans for the same.

title: The Shawshank Redemption
overview: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

title: Girl, Interrupted
overview: Set in the late 1960s, a young woman is admitted to a psychiatric hospital for treatment of borderline personality disorder.

title: The Matrix
overview: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

title: Inception
overview: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O.

title: Pulp Fiction
overview: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

title: Parasite
overview: Greed and class discrimination threaten the newly formed symbiotic relationship between the wealthy Park family and the destitute Kim clan.

title: Vertigo
overview: A retired San Francisco detective suffering from acrophobia becomes obsessed with the woman he’s been hired to follow.

title: Spirited Away
overview: During her family's move to the suburbs, a sullen 10-year-old girl wanders into a world ruled by gods, witches, and spirits, and where humans are changed into beasts.

title: Whiplash
overview: A promising young drummer enrolls at a cut-throat music conservatory where his dreams of greatness are mentored by an instructor who will stop at nothing to realize a student's potential.

title: The Godfather
overview: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

title: 8½
overview: A director suffering from creative block retreats into memories and dreams as he struggles to make his next film.

title: Lost Highway
overview: A saxophonist is accused of murder and undergoes a surreal transformation, descending into a nightmarish reality of identity shifts.

title: The Dark Knight
overview: When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, Batman must accept one of the greatest psychological and physical tests of his ability to fight injustice.

title: House
overview: A schoolgirl travels with her friends to her aunt’s haunted house where supernatural events quickly spiral into surreal chaos.

title: Double Indemnity
overview: An insurance salesman and a seductive housewife plot to murder her husband for the payout, but betrayal brews beneath the surface.
